name: Situation TARFU
description:
Overview
Situation TARFU has two main modes, the singleplayer mode "Classic" and the multiplayer versus mode "Totally Royal" both modes involve getting a high score however the singleplayer mode you compete with the local high score whereas in the versus mode you battle it out with a friend to steal points in an arena map.

At release the game features 6 characters each with their own stats and two modes! However more characters, modes and general content is on the way over the course of a couple years in the form of DLC!

Characters
TheXMan: The well rounded guy
M: Fast but her jump is weak
Mustache Guy: A slow runner but a high jumper
Erik: Rounded with a boost
Lincoln: Quick with a more balanced jump compared to M
Xaveternator: A tad bit quicker than TheXMan

Want to learn a little more about each character? Then head to the "Bios" and read about every character in the game to get a better idea of who you're playing as and learn a little about their history!

Totally And Royally FUn!
Got what it takes to get the highest score?

A Keyboard and one controller is required to play 2 players
